definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spin (NH id.; Aram. [[מַטְוַוְיְתָא]] spider Job 8:14 Targum (but Syr. t.wo0 = roast, broil, v. Dr:JPh xi, 1882, 207); As. ṭâmû (ṭâuû), spin, Hpt:ZA, 1887, 274 Dl:HWB 302; Ar. t.away fold, wind; Eth. t’awaya:: be twisted)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[טָווּ]] work of women of Isr. Ex 35:25 abs., v:Ex 35:26 sq. acc. [[אֶת־הָעִזִּים]] goats, i.e. goats' hair (P).
